column4: hi, idea why ubuntu freezes? it happens in single mode and in normal mode, WHY?
hey, idea why ubuntu freezes? it happens in single mode and in normal mode, WHY?
well, it happens in single after executing any command in menu, and after i type any command in shell, and in normal if i don't touch anything and when i login
does the desktop completely lock up?

yeah, it looks like that, no input response, also i got locked up one time and i found input has stopped working, and some times display freezes but system still works and sometimes it happened right when i tryed to switch screens
when it locks, can you press CTRL+ALT+F1 and get a login prompt?
which video chip do you use?
1) no, it locks right after ctrl+alt+f1  2) ati raedon 66250 with prop drivers loaded 3) no, i have 11.04, going to update to 11.10 but not yet, 4) sure
not sure, is it better without the proprietary driver
not running ubuntu again now, what i can i do instead?
